params.globalPoint: Point data of the total supply

acceptTransferOwnership().details: Must be called by the futureOwner

constructor.details: Sets the owner as the deployer of the contract

params._callProxy: CallProxy contract address. This should be set to AnyCallTranslator.

receive((int128,int128,uint256),(int128,.details: This function can only be called by the callProxy contract. Until this data is received, the user's veSDL balance will be treated as 0.

params._userPoint: veSDL balance data of the user

setCallProxy(address).details: callProxy contract address should be set to AnyCallTranslator.

Receive((int128,int128,uint256),(int128,.notice: Emitted when this contract receives data from the parent chain

UpdateCallProxy(address,address).notice: Emitted when call proxy address is updated

acceptTransferOwnership().notice: Accept the transfer of ownership of the contract

balanceOf(address).notice: Read the stored veSDL balance of the user

commitTransferOwnership(address).notice: Commit to transfer ownership of the contract

receive((int128,int128,uint256),(int128,.notice: Receive data from the parent chain for a user account

totalSupply().notice: Read the stored veSDL total supply

userdoc.notice: ChildOracle contract is responsible for receiving data from the parent chain
